script.name: !job.collect.marines
script.description: Job: Dukes, Collect marines fo boarding
script.sourceplaintext:
$MIN.SKILL = 60
while [TRUE] @ = wait 100 ms
@ $idle = [THIS] -> call script !lib.job.getidletime : @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=$idle wait while docked=[TRUE]
gosub sub.GetMarineCount
if $marine.count < 10 gosub sub.FindMarine
while size of table $table.marines @ = wait 100 ms $marine = get next key: table=$table.marines key=null $dock = $table.marines[$marine] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$dock if [DOCKEDAT] $next.marine = get next key: table=$table.marines key=null while $next.marine $marine = $next.marine $next.marine = get next key: table=$table.marines key=$next.marine $dock = $table.marines[$marine] if $dock == [DOCKEDAT] = [THIS] ->buy marine: $marine remove key $marine from table $table.marines end end end end
else if [HOMEBASE] -> exists $sector = [HOMEBASE] -> get sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=120 wait while docked=[TRUE]
gosub sub.GetMarineCount while $marine.count @ = wait 500 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.returnhome.std : if [THIS] -> is docked $marines = [THIS] -> get marines array if $marines $i = size of array $marines while $i dec $i =
if not [DOCKEDAT] -> free space for marines $dock.marines = [DOCKEDAT] -> get marines array $table = table alloc $j = size of array $marines while $j dec $j = $dock.m = $dock.marines[$j] $skill = $dock.m -> get marine fighting skill do if $skill < 40 $table[$dock.m] = $skill end if size of table $table $sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table $dock.m = get first item in array: $sorted.array = $dock.m -> destroy passenger end end
skip if [DOCKEDAT] -> free space for marines break
$marine = $marines[$i] = [THIS] ->unload marine: $marine end end end @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=120 wait while docked=[FALSE] gosub sub.GetMarineCount end end end end
return null
sub.FindMarine: $docks = find all stations with product: ware=Mercenary, class=Station, flags=[Find.DockingAllowed], refobj=[THIS] $table.docks = table alloc $i = size of array $docks while $i dec $i = $dock = $docks[$i] do if $dock == [HOMEBASE] continue $dock.sector = $dock -> get sector $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $dock.sector $table.docks[$dock] = $jumps end
$table.marines = table alloc
$docks = sort table keys by value: table=$table.docks $size = size of array $docks $i = 0 while $i < $size @ = wait 10 ms $dock = $docks[$i] inc $i = skip if $dock -> exists continue $marines = $dock -> get marines array $j = size of array $marines
while $j dec $j = $marine = $marines[$j] $skill = $marine -> get marine fighting skill if $skill >= $MIN.SKILL $table.marines[$marine] = $dock continue end $skill = $marine -> get marine mechanical skill if $skill >= $MIN.SKILL $table.marines[$marine] = $dock continue end $skill = $marine -> get marine hacking skill if $skill >= $MIN.SKILL $table.marines[$marine] = $dock continue end end
do if size of table $table.marines break end endsub
sub.GetMarineCount: $marine.count = 0 $marines = [THIS] -> get marines array do if $marines $marine.count = size of array $marines endsub return null

line.text: sort table keys by value: table=
find all stations with product: ware=
sort table keys by value: table=

sval.val: Job: Dukes, Collect marines fo boarding
